website_summaries.verdict: A nice collection of durable lures that won't limit you in terms of where you fish or what you fish for.
pros: Lure types include frogs, crankbaits, spoon lures, poppers, and 3 different kinds of plastic worms
A nice collection of hard, soft, and metal lures
Comes with a free tackle box
cons: Box was smaller than some buyers anticipated, and some claim that it arrived damaged

customer_reviews.title: Caught this toad on the rattle minnow and the telescope rod!
customer_reviews.text: Great for a beginner ! You can learn to fish top water, suspended, Ned rigs, jerk, jig the bottom and catch fish! Great products look to get more from this company!
customer_reviews.author: ALan

customer_reviews.title: Great bass kit!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is great! I have had multiple strikes on the lures and the spinners. These hooks are very strong and resiliant to bending. I have attached a picture of the bass I caught tonight with a brass lure from this kit. Everything included is of the highest quality and sure to get you your next catch! Great action on all of the spinners, very well designed!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Good value and great starter kit!
customer_reviews.text: Really great starter tackle kit for bass fishing. I was new to plussino gear, but I was not disappointed ! The top water frogs have held up really well and I am a big fan of the spinner baits. I also caught 4 large mouth on the senko worms yesterday. This is a great starter kit for someone getting into bass fishing , it has a little bit of everything
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Clockedile

customer_reviews.title: Great set of lures, jig heads and plastic baits!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of lures, jig heads and plastic baits! I have bought Plusinno products before (rods. reels, and baits) and am very happy with their quality. This set of baits is great for fishing for bass, perch and pickerel in my local pond. Good deal!
customer_reviews.author: lay opinion

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 102 piece PLUSINNO Fishing Lures and Tackle. I found this set to be of high quality and it contains everything you would need to outfit your tackle box for a summer of lake fishing. It contains soft plastic worms, crank paits shiners and spinning bait. I have had good luck catching small and large mouth bass, pickerel and perch with the lures. I especially like the top water frogs and jigs. It also comes with plenty of hooks and swivels and leaders to get started. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lures at a great price
customer_reviews.text: These lures were an excellent purchase decision. I've used them for both river and lake fishing and they've worked perfectly for both! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Great fishing tackle kit! Great quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great fishing tackle kit! Everything you need! Great quality and very well put together! Package and fast delivery. I used this tackle kit a few times now to setup my rig that also used on my Plussino Rod and Reel. Most of my fishing gear is Plussino. Reasonable price and great quality fishing gear. After each use, i rinse my gear off with potable water. Haven't seen rust or signs of degrade yet. Plussino makes great fishing gear for the a reasonable and cheap price!
customer_reviews.author: Surachat O’Neal

customer_reviews.title: A huge variety for an exceptional price
customer_reviews.text: Our 8 year old is just getting into fishing and this includes everything you’d need for a tackle box other than the fishing line and bobbers. The variety and amount of supplies included is a huge value for the price. We’ve seen some of the lures in this kit sold individually at Cabela’s for $5+ a piece so this is a huge savings over buying all these things separately. He’s especially excited to use the frogs.
customer_reviews.author: Reesarose

customer_reviews.title: Amazing durability!
customer_reviews.text: Got these to try out to review and let me start by saying I’m completely shocked at the durability! Took them out fishing this morning and managed to snag a few times not once loosing a lure! These are great for bass fishing, and fit perfect into my tackle box! They would also make a great gift to anyone who loves GOOD QUALITY!!! This little set is a great product, I might add, that when I opened them there was a little extra silicon on the hooks but I just peeled it off and it did not effect the product! This set is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jolene

customer_reviews.title: Great for fishing sports.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for relative and he is so happy. Catching large fish of all kinds. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jean V

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff for casual fishing.
customer_reviews.text: I received this fishing lure kit as a gift.After careful inspection,I realize the high quality the lures were.They are very lifelike.I like the use of colors used on the lures.The steel used on the hooks appear to be high quality. I look forward to using them on my light rod and reels.
customer_reviews.author: James Rehberger

customer_reviews.title: Small Problem
customer_reviews.text: Just received. Good starter package. Only problem was the 10 metal spinning lures. 6 of them were tarnished, as if moisture was in the package. Would contact manufacturer but it is an unsecured website, so forget it.
customer_reviews.author: James Schott

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: Really good kit. Add the 263pcs. to make the ultimate kit.
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to get started. I highly recommend adding the 263pcs. kit to create a wholistic fishing jump kit. UPDATE: Plusinno refunded me a percentage of the cost due to the missing jig heads. My fishing kit is now complete. Anyone that buys this, please make sure to check and audit all the items to insure you have everything before going fishing. Jig heads are highly important to have. Without the jig heads, half your kit is useless. You can always buy a 10 pack at your local store, but please audit and report to Plusinno to increase their quality assurance.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C. Rochon

customer_reviews.title: buy it to figure out what you like, but the company customer support is outstanding
customer_reviews.text: basically it got something of everything to get you started. Once you have a rough idea what you like it becomes kinda useless. Way too many spoons Update: the company reached out to me and wanted to know what should be changed and how they can ensure customer satisfaction. Needless to say we are very happy about this level of support and are looking forward to continue using and buying their products.
customer_reviews.author: berlinguyinca

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing feels cheap or flimsy, everything included like the picture. Would buy again (but won't ever need too!)
customer_reviews.author: Pete Tomczik

customer_reviews.title: Great for yourself or even as a gift
customer_reviews.text: These baits are all great quality and insane quantity. So many lures for one low price! The frogs swim good, the crank baits are great, the top water hard baits are perfect, and the plastics look amazing in water. I couldn’t tell much difference between the more expensive hooks I normally buy and these. The spinnerbaits are top notch and everything I opened was great. Can’t wait to catch some fish and order from this company again in the future. 10/10 one of the best beginner fishing kits. Also customer support in this company is phenomenal and I would recommend them to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Top water fishing lures
customer_reviews.text: It comes with everything as described and pike lures all decent quality. It would be great to use in a kayak, a boat or even fishing from a dock or from land. Great !!!
customer_reviews.author: John McAfee

customer_reviews.title: Great looking lures
customer_reviews.text: My initial thoughts on these is they are going to be good lures. I am just getting started fishing again after being not doing it for years so my skill or lack of is taken into consideration. The lures themselves seem very well put together. I have tugged on the hooks and connections and seem solidly made. The colors and textures are similar to the higher priced lures at the sporting goods stores. I am looking forward to the spring summer when I will hopefully catch something with them. Based on price and quality I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderlust Addict

customer_reviews.title: Not as much of a deal as you'd think.
customer_reviews.text: The hooks, swivels, rubber lures, and small tackle box (the size of an old school vhs rental box) are pretty decent, as are the metal spinners, but the swim baits with the double treble hooks are only the size of a quarter and very poorly built. I'm going to return the box cause it does't quiet feel like it was worth the $34.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: The Plusinno 102 piece fishing tackle selection!
customer_reviews.text: The Plusinno 102 piece assorted fishing tackle kit is a good value. It comes with a nice variety of tackle including various crank baits, lures, spinners, hooks, plastic worms, a plastic frog, leaders, snap swivels, weights and luminescent beads. All in a small plastic tackle box with adjustable compartments. This set up is good for most fisherman from the beginner to the more experienced angler. Good price for this type of assortment. I am looking forward to trying this out soon.
customer_reviews.author: James  S.

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad kit
customer_reviews.text: Honestly there really isn't much to dislike. These fishing products are a great starting point for not just a beginner fisherman but any fisherman that would like to increase their tackle box. The extra hooks always come in handy, the leader lines are perfect for when you want to catch a gar or any toothy fishy, not to mention the lures are brightly colored and appealing to the eye. However one thing I didn't like is exactly that, there are slightly too many bright colored lures. This kit would be spot on if it contained some darker colored lures personally. Really giving it 4.5 stars only because it could use 1 or 2 darker colored lures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product with a little bit of everything. Perfect for begginers and pros alike i would recommend it to anyone who fishes and needs lures and hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Blade Villanova

customer_reviews.title: Good value, easy for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners who aren't sure what they need. There's a good spread of everything you need for a good price. Quality is good for costing half as much as buying the pieces individually. Comes in a nice tackle box with a rising shelf, but once everything is unpacked its a tight fit. Quality is good enough to use without worrying if it fails, but price is low enough to not worry about catching on driftwood and losing it.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice assortment
customer_reviews.text: Looks great so far. Nice assortment of lures. Great for kids or someone just starting who wants stuff to try out before they start specializing in what type of fish they want to catch. Trips to the lake, beach, etc...great places to have a variety to choose from. Will it actually catch any fish? I’ll let you know on our next trip and update this review. Another plus - it fits in the case that my son’s telescoping rod/reel go in.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Tons of Tackle in a Tiny Container!
customer_reviews.text: There is so many items packed in this tiny container! Has everything we need to add to our current tackle. One can never have enough fishing tackle. Great quality! Purchased one for my son after seeing what a great product this was. Once you take everything out, you will not get it back inside the provided container. I did not mind because I put it in the larger tackle box.
customer_reviews.author: HAMPTN

customer_reviews.title: Decent value for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's not a bad kit. It comes in a case that is small and compact. It has everything you will need for some freshwater fishing. I used it on a lake and the spoons worked well and attracted different species. The spinners and grubs also worked well. If you're looking for a lot to get started or just for a vacation then this is the kit for you.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Huge variety of lures for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: You really get a whole ton of lures in this package. Everything you could want from worms to frogs, top water, poppers, spinners, spoons and more! Weights included as well. Of course these can't make you a better fisherman but they can certainly help you have the tools to succeed! I can't wait to catch many fish with these lures in all types of situations and terrain. Thank you Plusinno for delivering once again!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good kit but can be improved.
customer_reviews.text: Like: Spinnerbaits are of decent quality Good variety for beginners to learn (top water , reaction bite, senko worm slow fishing ) A nice selection of spoons Good hooks and jig heads for the soft grubs Didn't like: The snap swivel was hard to unlock/lock and compared to walmart brand I would select the one from walmart, please use same material as the swivle supplied Worm hooks would have been better if were notmal lead or black material Curved tail grubs missing the best color( white )
customer_reviews.author: Mokarrab

customer_reviews.title: Not for the serious fishermen
customer_reviews.text: Everything came in great condition although the quality appears to be a bit below average. I've used the spoons with success, however; I cannot say the same for the frogs (possibly defective) . Both took on water right out of the box and one has already lost the circular metal bottom, which has rendered it completely useless. This was after only using it for maybe a dozen cast. I'll be sure to update again when I get the chance to use all of the lures.
customer_reviews.author: NMN

customer_reviews.title: Great set of lures
customer_reviews.text: Just getting back into fishing now, I didn't have many lures. This set is a great way to try out a little bit of everything. It's great for teaching my son too, because if he loses a bunch of these into trees/rocks, it's not like buying individual lures at $4-5 each. It's a great variety too, so if one kind of lure isn't working, it's great to have lots of others to try.
customer_reviews.author: VT Beerloverguy

customer_reviews.title: Great starter lure kit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 102 piece Plusinno lure Kit and it didn’t disappoint. All 102 pieces are included in a small portable tackle box great for Kayak fishing. This kits comes with plenty of crankbaits, spinnerbaits, jigs and even plastic worms for Bass. You can easily fish using a jig head or Texas rig. Very pleased with this assortment and the quality of Plusinno Lures and hooks. They don’t feel cheaply made and feel like they will last.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great lures.
customer_reviews.text: These are great lures. My husband and my young son both like the Plusinno lures. They work well and are easy to use. A great set. The seller is super helpful as well. Definitely recommend these lures.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Decent Lures
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent lures in size and pattern. It comes with a variety of different types of lures and it would a perfect lure set for beginner fishermen. I believe LMB loves them and it may also be a nice choice for light saltwater fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Yan

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service and awesome tackle
customer_reviews.text: This tackle is amazing! I lost the first box due to unfortunate circumstances but i emailed the company and they got back to me within 24 hours each day. Had a second one sent out to me and there's so many things! I fish as of now and these were a gift to my husband. I have caught more with them lol. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Good Assortment for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had much luck getting bites, but that could be the Indian and not the Arrow. Good assortment for the money. Was able to build a couple of Texas and Carolina Rigs to pair with the crank baits, spoons, and Jigs already packaged. Could use more, and a wider variety of weights, and maybe some bobbers to pair with the rigs.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron C.

customer_reviews.title: Great kit with a wide variety of lure types
customer_reviews.text: Great variety of lures for someone just getting into fishing, but the action and the quality of the crankbaits are a lot cheaper compared to lures from main brands (rapala, strike king etc.). It’s a great way to try out a wide variety of lure types for bass fishing. The bend spoons it comes with are nice and had very good action. I would recommend this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good kit for my 9 yr old daughter to take to camp.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 9 yr old daughter to take to camp. Everything looks as it did in the picture and felt decent enough quality for the price. She was super happy with this kit. I needed something relatively inexpensive that would make her happy and this did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M.

customer_reviews.title: Keeping my fingers crossed
customer_reviews.text: I hope my boyfriend likes these, they look a little weak dont know for sure going to try them out.
customer_reviews.author: allie

customer_reviews.title: perfect for luring fish into accepting an invitation for dinner.
customer_reviews.text: Great little kit. Got them for my nephews birthday. He loved it. Had to get him a larger tackle box as the box it comes in is fairly small and not very durable, but the lures is basically what your buying it for anyways. I had asked a question and the customer service was excellent with a very fast reply.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Lots of different kinds of lures to choose, you can always find one that fits your fishing
customer_reviews.text: Lots of different lures that suitable for almost every different fishing situations you may meet, no matter ocean water fishing or fresh water fishing; no matter big fish or small; no matter bass, carp, crappie, trout and etc. You can always find a good lure for your case. Especially the frog lure, I found it's even more efficient than the expensive ones(about $20 each) from local tackle store. Big bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: vistatqzh

customer_reviews.title: Great set of gear!
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually a salt water kind of guy but picked this up with plans on camping by lake/river more. First day using caught 2 real nice stripper and a 3 lb bass. That in itself says all I need to know about the product. They give you a great selection of different jigs/lures/leaders/weights. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Lisk

customer_reviews.title: Everything is included for a nice trip out fishing
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing how many pieces fit into such a small tackle box, which is awesome for my camping trips since it will accommodate pretty much any lake or stream we come across.
customer_reviews.author: JOANN

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: One box got all difference kinda lures you need for bass fishing. Great value for this great product. Solid quality. Highly recommend for beginners will definitely save lot money for you !
customer_reviews.author: Rong Lin

customer_reviews.title: These baits are Amazing !!
customer_reviews.text: Excited about putting these to use! Seem very well made, and we are happy with the variety of lures. couldn't wait to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: It's a lot of stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot of stuff for a beginner bass angler! Would recommend to buy it as a starter kit. Couple things: let the soft lures sit in the open so the smell goes away. The box is kind of small, have another place to move some stuff to.
customer_reviews.author: Igor K.

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT FISHING SET
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for birthday. He loves fishing, so I think he will love this. Nice variety, and cost was reasonable. LOOKING forward to seeing his face when he opens this gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent variety for lake and river fishing
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, pleasantly surprised by the selection of lures. Has good variety in one box to use in lake or river fishing. Got them for my kid and he will put them to good use.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment!
customer_reviews.text: Huge assortment of accessories that'll get any beginner catching things on his first trip out. Great value to try different things and let you decide what specific products work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Don Pepin

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety
customer_reviews.text: Right away I was impressed with the variety in this pack. An assortment of rubbers, plastics, spinners, swivels, and hooks. Definitely a great starter kit or travel kit to keep in your car for spur of the moment pond hopping. The hooks seem to be good quality and I didn’t need to sharpen them like I do right away for other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: So many fishing lures and hooks
customer_reviews.text: There are so many lures and hooks inside is the big point I like, the jig hooks are my favorite, good size for me to catch a bass, but there are some pieces kind like useless, that’s why I take one star out.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Kit!!
customer_reviews.text: My son and my husband are new to fishing and this gives a little of everything to stared. The hooks are durable and the fishing lure set are made well.
customer_reviews.author: henry

customer_reviews.title: Good starter set
customer_reviews.text: This kit is perfect for starter and intermediate level fish enthusiasts. Here you will find hooks, weights, shiners, plastic worms, plastic squid, and other types of bait.
customer_reviews.author: MarkNat

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little 102 Piece Fishing Tackle Kit
customer_reviews.text: Nice Little 102 Piece Fishing Tackle Kit, Lots of lures and terminal tackle. Mine is in my truck, behind my seat with my Plusinno telescopic fishing rod and reel set. Everything I need to go fishing. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Youtube captainhook'd fishing

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner Set
customer_reviews.text: I got this set and use it with my new KastKing baitcaster set up. Works and moves great. Caught some nice large mouth bass already on this!!! 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: Steven S.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my father and he said it was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was definitely surprised by how amazing this kit is! The frogs are AWESOME. I love the weights that come with it, they are the best ones I've ever used. There is such a wide variety of lures and tackle that you have a pretty well rounded set up. I would recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Good set for fishing
customer_reviews.text: It is very good set for all kind of fish place from salty to fresh water. All you need is this set. Take it and go
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: For the money I wasn't expecting quality! It was a pleasant surprise upon getting the lure kit. All the lures were exactly as described and exceeded my expectations. Went fishing today for bass and brown trout, unfortunately nothing was bitting. I field tested each of the lures and they all preformed as they should. I will definitely recommend this lure kit to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Williams

customer_reviews.title: Clean the paint on jig head eye.
customer_reviews.text: The eyes of the jig heads need to be cleared out a little bit, some of the paint covers the hole and should be removed before you put line on. Really good feeling soft plastics. Super durable and seem like made out of a sturdy material. Good variety of baits for a variety of situations. Super compact tackle box. I fish for large mouth that are a little bit bigger than the baits are made for. The hooks seem a little smaller than I personally use which is better if your fishing for a larger variety of fish, and not just large mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for this born again fisherman.
customer_reviews.text: Is exactly what I wanted! Packaged nicely and great purchase for this born again fisherman.
customer_reviews.author: Greg K.

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not professional bait by any means, but it is fun for people like me to have variety. The kids love it so I guess it’s a win
customer_reviews.author: Aaron F.

customer_reviews.title: Got these to go with my son's easter basket
customer_reviews.text: He already saw them and really likes them. He's looking forward to using them next weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Pride

customer_reviews.title: Many option to fish.
customer_reviews.text: everything you need for bass. Need to know what you're doing with the gear but easy to learn. Get some scent for your gear and you're set.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie South

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice gift for a little boy lots of choices in this set shipped very fast
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette A. Glass

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is a amazing tackle kit, with a lot of lures and fun, I recommend this for you to buy, very good quality lures
customer_reviews.author: richard rosenau

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment of lures for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this fishing lure set off of amazon. There was 102 pieces as was said on the set although some of the pieces are terminal tackle like weights, swivels and beads. The lures that I tested out all had good action to them and would work if the water temperature was warmer by me. I did get a white bass and a walleye on the grubs. Im looking forward to using the spinnerbaits and frogs in warmer water
customer_reviews.author: Hans Klopp

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for beginners and pro bass fishermen
customer_reviews.text: Received product fast. Everything is made for bass like it says. Comes with a mini tackle box. This is basically everything you need for over half a year even if you fish daily it is long lasting stuff for daily fishing. Great value fast delivery high quality products well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: So well Made! Used in the lake and the ocean!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great kit of lures. They are very well made and the big fish lure Hooked a huge bass! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette G Majors

customer_reviews.title: Just the beginning
customer_reviews.text: I’ve fished occasionally my whole life, but I never considered myself an angler. I’ve recently become addicted to fishing. More specific, bass fishing. I’ve had tackle, but nothing with this selection. I just started using it and it’s worked great. The lures are good quality, and the plastics run smooth. Can’t wait to dive deeper.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Got free with a purchase of another product. Gave them to my parents that started fishing in the gulf recently. Used the twirly tails on my fishing trip to Baja and had huge success!
customer_reviews.author: James Muller

customer_reviews.title: A Lot of Stuff for the Money.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad as a beggining anglers tackle collection. But certainly not what an avid fisherman would like.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Its cheap. But its not bad. For the price its great. If you're a beginner or you dont want to spend alot i would buy. If you are a professional angler it might not be the best set. The frogs will sink and you have to drain them after a few cast. And all the hook aren't as sharp as I'd like, but they will hook fish. The case is handy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Variety seems good. Missing at least 10 pieces based on the picture though. Packaging was destroyed
customer_reviews.text: I like the variety. Seems like a good bang for your buck. That said, the box was DOA so I wasn't able to use that.
customer_reviews.author: Pam (Chicago)

customer_reviews.title: Great Lures
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my brother who is an avid fisherman.he says that they are ok and likes the fact that there are so many in the collection and also that they are different designs.all in all it was a good buy.they arrived very quickly long before the arrival date that the seller provided, i will buy again if i need
customer_reviews.author: Besi

customer_reviews.title: Great variety of items.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson and he loved it, which has a variety of items. So many different fishing lures, difference sizes, colors, some soft and some hard. A great addition to your camping bag.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment and good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great assortment of fishing tackle, including plastic worms, spoons, spinners, jigs and more. Also includes some nice hooks and weights. Look forward to catching some fish with this nice, colorful assortment of lures.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: This little kit has everything you need. Great bang for your buck and the variety of lures is impressive. The tackle box is made of plastic and doesn’t feel cheap in your hands and it has a double deck which is awesome. Would recommend to beginners or seasoned fishers who want an all in one package.
customer_reviews.author: Hanzla

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of lures
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with my purchase. they look like they will work well. exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: jessenia melendez

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Pure garbage. Pieces falling off, bent hooks, etc. Typical garbage made in China. Good for a 3 year olds first "set"
customer_reviews.author: BOATS

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Good intro kit. My five year old was successful after a little patience. Frog legs fell out, and worm was unusable after one catch.
customer_reviews.author: John Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Plusinno delivers a quality product for cheap
customer_reviews.text: High quality product. Plastic baits are well made and more realistically in the water. Nice box to keep everything compact.
customer_reviews.author: Rumen D.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Value
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations! Purchased this as a gift for my boyfriend and he thought it was an expensive assortment, the value is very worth it! Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great lures!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone that loves to fish rather its bass fishing or cat fishing should have this set!! It will meet your any needs.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: i have to give you 5 star fish my first day in 1 hours i have like 5 fish i used only 2 different spoons if you want a good kit for your fishing there is nothing better in the market and this kit quality is great sharp hooks nice case PS price is crazy 27pcs + a case buy it now highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Ton of variety for every situation!
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good quality and have lots of variety. I caught a decent size bass using the green plastic swimbait. Definitely worth the money for how much comes in that box. I would definitely recommend this to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Liang

customer_reviews.title: great selection
customer_reviews.text: hard to find gifts for grandsons these fit the bill
customer_reviews.author: mature consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great Lures and baits
customer_reviews.text: This product made putting together a friends birthday present so easy. i just had to connect the lures to the line and wallah.
customer_reviews.author: Leonid Polivoda

customer_reviews.title: These fishing lures are great addition to my fishing equipment
customer_reviews.text: I like my fishing lures .They look like little fish food .
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Perry

customer_reviews.title: Good tackle lure kit for starting out
customer_reviews.text: I am returning to fishing after many years and was looking for a starter lure kit. This one contains most things I need. The box could be a little bigger as everything is cramped in there but it’s not a big deal as I plan on buying a bigger tackle box to store other fishing accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. There was so much tackle stuffed into this little box. The quality is great and they give you a bit of everything. The frogs are so much fun to use. I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew 13th birthday I bought him these and they were a HUGE HIT! I’m the Aunt if the year with this!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Byoutoday

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kit to add to the collection.
customer_reviews.text: Received these a couple days ago and after just one use i have to say i feel great about the kit. All the soft bates feel very durable and life like. They move thru the water great and the colors are awesome to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: All A beginner needs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tackle box for beginners. Has a little bit of everything you need and more! Good place to start tackle collection. Hooks, leaders, top water baits, stick baits - this kit has it all. Grab this box and head out to the lake!
customer_reviews.author: Stark

customer_reviews.title: Eh... not so much
customer_reviews.text: I would give these a "C". probably OK for 8 year old but not average fisherman.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: They have fantastic quality and I can't wait to caught mouth bass.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Yeah this set would have been really nice if the entire box hadn’t arrive shattered, I actually got stabbed in the finger when I picked up the package because all of the hooks were loose in the shipping bag
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great buy so much stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Really good buy! The case they came in isn't very durable but so much stuff for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani

customer_reviews.title: Grandson LOVED it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10 year old grandson, he's getting to a hard age for buying presents. He just loved this tackle set. He loves to fish and knows his tackle, said this has good lures and he can't wait to use it. After they left he told my daughter, grandma did good! High praise from a 10 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Quality is outstanding
customer_reviews.text: My son in law was excited when I gave him this. Very good quality lures! Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Better then i expected.
customer_reviews.text: I dont know why people are saying the lures are small. There actually bigger then i expected i got 141 pieces just extra hooks but still. Over all love the product
customer_reviews.author: Amanda N McAbee

product_meta.title: PLUSINNO Fishing Lures Baits Tackle Including Crankbaits, Spinnerbaits, Plastic Worms, Jigs, Topwater Lures, Tackle Box and More Fishing Gear Lures Kit Set, 102/67/27Pcs Fishing Lure Tackle
feature_bullets: 🎣 PLUSINNO fishing tackle set collects nearly all accessories including fishing lures, hooks, Jig Head, Weights Sinker, Line Stopper, Barrel Swivel, Free Tackle Box, an overall fishing lures kit for saltwater and freshwater, Perfect for ocean, lake, river, reservoir, pond and stream.

🎣 102Pcs Fishing Lures Tackle Box Kit contains a large variety of baits, covering Crankbaits 6pcs, Metal Spinning Lures 10pcs, spinnerbaits 4pcs, Topwater Fishing Frog Lures 2pcs, 3 different Plastic Worms 18pcs, reliable and all-around choice for any angler and fishing enthusiast.

🎣 The lifelike design crankbaits are made of 3 D Eyes and super-realistic paint. The Plastic Worms have 3 kinds of different style and size, which the largest length is to 14 cm. Our superior fishing lures will help to attract more catches and provoke predator fish to strike.
🎣 All fishing tackles are packed in a double-layer box which is easy to carry, and convenient to get the exact fishing tackles you need.
🎣 Compact and easy to take around. It's the best gift to send father, son, husband, fiancé, boyfriend for the upcoming Christmas.
